articles.title: Apple will release iOS 18, macOS 15, iPadOS 18, other updates on September 16 - Ars Technica
articles.description: Apple Intelligence won’t be part of the initial launch.

Apple plans to release the next versions of iOS, iPadOS, macOS, and watchOS to the general public on September 16, the company announced via its website following its iPhone-centric product event… [+2063 chars]

articles.title: As PS5 Pro Rumors Swirl, Sony Announces PS5 Technical Presentation Hosted by Mark Cerny - IGN
articles.description: Sony has announced a PlayStation 5 Technical Presentation hosted by Mark Cerny, in which the company is expected to announce the PS5 Pro. Check here for all the details.
articles.content:
Sony has announced a PlayStation 5 Technical Presentation hosted by Mark Cerny, set for tomorrow, September 10 at 8am PT / 4pm UK time.
